comment: The question that has never clearly been answered to me when I have posed it : What would Trump have to do to lose your support ? The long pauses and blank stares are scary . For those this applies to - feel free to answer .

                                    :ARG1 (s / support-01
                                          :ARG1 p))))
                  :ARG1-of (c / clear-06)
                  :time (p2 / pose-01

                        :ARG1 q)
                  :time (e / ever))
            :snt2 (s2 / scary-03

                        :op2 (s3 / stare-01

                  :ARG1 (t / that

            :snt3 (f / feel-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (f2 / free-04
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG3 (a5 / answer-01
                              :ARG0 y))
                  :ARG2 t)))
